summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4400 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 19 and 20, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue West and Queen Anne Avenue, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52027, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
